function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Presence of genetic material of sars-cov-2 in urban wastewater as an indicator of potential virus presence in the area.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Distrust towards tap water and alternative water sources","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased production of organic and inorganic waste","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Suspension of recycling programs","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prohibited waste sorting in buildings with sars-cov-2 positive or suspected subjects","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of returnable waste practices","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on internet and wi-fi networks for operation and remote control","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of living environments into multi-functional spaces during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excessive use of it systems in housing units due to smart working, online lessons, and entertainment activities increases the risk of indoor contagious disease propagation.","category":"Living","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Introduction of new high-performing computer networks like 5g may result in increased exposure of the population to radio frequency electromagnetic fields, leading to potential health risks.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased disputes due to force majeure provisions in contracts","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contractual issues such as late payments, material breach of contract, repudiation, delay damages, risk allocation","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented economic recession triggered by the coronavirus crisis","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and training on covid-19 interventions for businesses","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disputes between employers and contractors due to lack of timely notices","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in determining the distribution and magnitude of infected populations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of early warning system for pandemics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in scaling conventional testing for mass surveillance","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of environmental science tools for monitoring pandemic spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity and throughput due to current diagnostic methods","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient targeting of higher-risk sub-populations for testing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy, ethics, and legal concerns limiting the application of wbe","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for undetected outbreaks in confined subpopulations like schools, hospitals, and warehouses.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of manufacturing and supply chains for diagnostic testing.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data-driven strategy for reopening and closing economies during resurgence of outbreaks.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Early re-opening of businesses and termination of population isolation could lead to a covid-19 rebound or seasonal re-emergence.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wbe may detect covid-19 before it is possible with random diagnostic testing, but the timing of virus shedding is uncertain.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in the timing of shedding sars-cov-2 into stool and persistence of shedding after symptoms resolve poses challenges for wbe.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation of wbe to direct measures of viral infection such as pcr or antigen testing","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sampling and sample preparation for sewage analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for significant forward transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate information on the proportion of the total population that remains uninfected","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased willingness to comply with government recommendations for distancing and self-isolation","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Asymptomatic infections persist, leading to undetected clusters of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research and collaboration across scientific disciplines for the development of wbe as a public health tool.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the correlation between wbe data and community-wide population demographics in relation to contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of qualitative approach in wbe monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of intercommunity comparison in semi-quantitative approach of wbe monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of intra-and inter-person variability in the magnitude of virus excretion/shedding.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the excretion-route distribution of virus markers , fecal versus urine and unknown importance for different markers.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the half-life persistence of virus markers in wastewater and its impact on sampling methods and measurement accuracy.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of sewage networks and treatment plants can lead to delayed detection of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in accurately estimating the population size contributing to a sewage treatment plant can result in inaccurate calculations of the percentage of infected population.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of infection rates between communities using wbe monitoring data requires careful calibration and standardization procedures.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient monitoring data for contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient testing leading to lack of confidence in the public about the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of repeated resurgence of covid-19 and common seasonal infectious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on preprints without peer review for research and decision-making","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of disease leading to development of military cantonments","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate environmental and behavioral interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
